title: Lucius
author: Lucius
content: Does anyone have a problem displaying their personal avatar? Today I noticed that my avatar is not displayed in this thread.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5399845.msg60211983#msg60211983I use Firefox 100.0.2 on W10 with AdBlock off on the forum.I noticed that my avatar is not displayed in case I access the post through the path Profile -> Show Post - no post I access that way shows an avatar... As far as I've seen, the avatars of other members are displayed correctly.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: I see it clearly the same as what your wearing now in this thread and on that thread. Maybe just a couple of force refresh will do the work?

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Try a hard refresh: CTRL-F5.It works fine here.

comments.author: xSkylarx
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceV on May 25, 2022, 10:31:24 AMTry a hard refresh: CTRL-F5.It works fine here.This solves the issue. It is mostly cache issues. That is why you need to hard refresh it to clear those caches and download the new one. If it still does not work, try it on another browser or try it on another device. As you can see, most of us stated that it is already showing. It is just on your end (client side) that it isn't working. I do experience this mostly if I change signature campaigns. This is really what I do or I just wait for it to reflect on my end.

comments.author: aysg76
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceV on May 25, 2022, 10:31:24 AMTry a hard refresh: CTRL-F5.It works fine here.That will do the work most probably as if there's some issues while changing avatar also or it not being displayed the hard refresh with Ctrl -F5 is the solution and you will the see the changes.I have checked the same way @Lucius said through Profile> check post for myself and Avatar is visible to me as for him also.So just clearing the cache will reload the page and it will be visible to you.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: This is the first time I've had problems with an avatar, and it was especially weird to see the avatars of all the other members except my own. Please note that this is not a new uploaded avatar that takes some time to show up.After I cleared the cache/cookies/browsing history and restarted the browser the avatar is visible again.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: Lucius on May 25, 2022, 12:27:58 PMAfter I cleared the cache/cookies/browsing history and restarted the browser the avatar is visible again. Most of Avatar related problems is due to caching delete it, and/or restart your browser and the problem will be solved.
